name: Wibble Wobble
description:
download the multiplayer version here

keyboard controls

move ................................ arrow keys
jump ........................... Z or X or space
navigate ..................... arrow keys or tab
select/restart ........ Z or X or space or enter
back to title ........................... escape
toggle mute .................................. M
toggle fullscreen .................. alt + enter


xbox controls

move ................................ left stick
jump ......................................... A
navigate ............................ left stick
select/restart ............................... A
back to title ................................ B

log in using your gamejolt username and game token

your scores won't be uploaded to the leaderboard unless you're logged in


collect stars to boost your score multiplier

avoid hazards, stay alive and get a high score

made by Daniel Linssen (@managore)
with audio by Shannon Mason (@pongball)
and thanks to @takorii and @isyourguy


made for #indiesvsgamers
